properties.comment:
This configuration describes the labels of buttons and menu items or some important user messages in graphical user interfaces. Although the preferred way would be to have separate key-value pairs for actual labels and their corresponding tooltips, you may want to use just one key-value pair, in which the tooltip is located after the separator ";". Otherwise, please use the suffix "_TOOLTIP" to indicate a tooltip for some label.
Please see the JavaDoc for MessageFormatter and Formatter.
